Metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1050 affecting package samba for versions less than 4.12.5-6
Metadata.Description: CVE-2018-1050 affecting package samba for versions less than 4.12.5-6. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package samba is earlier than 4.12.5-6, affected by CVE-2018-1050
